001.name: sitting_dog
001.instruction: Generate an image of a dog sitting on a grass field. The result should be a high-quality image.

002.name: flowing_river
002.instruction: Generate a 2-second video of a river flowing through a valley with mountains in the background. The result should be a high-quality video.

003.name: president_trump_video
003.instruction: You are given an image `president_trump.jpg`, which is a photo of President Trump. Create a 2-second video of President Trump speaking based on the image. The result should be a high-quality video.

004.name: table_fork_replacement
004.instruction: You are given an image `dish_table.png` of a table filled with dishes. Replace the fork on the table with a spoon. The result should be a high-quality image without visible artifacts.

005.name: street_car_removal
005.instruction: You are given an image `street_car.png` of a red car parked on the street. Remove the car from the street. The result should be a high-quality image without visible artifacts.

006.name: bedroom_style_cloning
006.instruction: You are given an image `warm_bedroom.jpg`, which is a photo of a bedroom with warm lighting. Follow the style of the bedroom to generate a living room. The result should be an image of a living room with a similar decoration style.

007.name: girl_pose_cloning
007.instruction: You are given an image `play_guitar.jpg` of a girl playing the guitar. Generate an image of an old man playing the guitar in a forest with the same pose as the girl. The result should be a realistic image of an old man playing the guitar.

008.name: budapest_image_extension
008.instruction: You are given an image `budapest_city.jpg`, which is a photo of the city of Budapest. Extend the image by 128 pixels on both the left and right sides. The result should be a larger image of the city of Budapest.

009.name: people_image_upscaling
009.instruction: You are given an image `many_people.png`, which is a low-resolution photo of a crowd of people. Upscale the image by 4x. The result should be a high-resolution image of the crowd of people.

010.name: taylor_video_interpolation
010.instruction: You are given a video `taylor_swift.mp4`, which is a video of Taylor Swift speaking on stage. Interpolate the video to increase the frame rate by 3x. The result should be a smoother video of Taylor Swift speaking.
